attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I was out of date on my car tax owing £15.76 for being untaxed. My car was clamped and I was unable to afford the release fees. My car was removed and crushed. The court then imposed further fines upon me. The car was a loss of £450.00 to myself. There must be many people suffering from this unfair practice

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
